summary: This mod will allow you to re-customise your character without use of the console.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Race Menu Options


------------------------------------------------------
Author: MojoDaJojo

------------------------------------------------------

0: Name / Author
1: Thanks / Credits
2: Requirements
3: Description
4: Installation / Uninstallation
5: Version History / Bug Fixes
6: Incompatibilities / Known Issues
7: Legal

------------------------------------------------------
1: Thanks/Credits

Bethesda - For making games that someone as challenged as me can mod.

The Nexus - For the most troll free & hassle free place to upload a mod.


------------------------------------------------------
2: Requirements

Skyrim v 1.9.32.0.8 or >

------------------------------------------------------
3: Description

Short:

This mod will allow you to somewhat re-customise your character without use of the console, 

but you won\'t be able to change your sex, race, or name. 

Look for Hargnar Heavy-Feet in the Winking Skeever Inn located in Solitude. 

____________________

Long:

This mod will allow you to somewhat re-customise your character without use of the console, 

but you won\'t be able to change your sex, race, or name. 


Look for Hargnar Heavy-Feet in the Winking Skeever Inn located in Solitude. 

He wears a pinkish robe and has a huge sandbox package.  (He may be upstairs in a room.)


 
There are 3 different methods available in the mod  for re-customisation;

each of which, will whisk you away to a well-lit cell. 

You can buy a spell (base price 500 gold) or amulet (base price 500 gold) 

that will allow you to bring up the customisation menu at any time, 

or you can just pay Hargnar a fee of 50 gold for your \"haircut.\"



_________________________

To use the spell go to powers and equip it then use your shout key to use it.

To use the amulet go to apparel equip the amulet then exit your inventory and wait one or two seconds.

To use Hargnar talk to him and pay him the 50 gold.

_________________________

Boring technical stuff:


This file utilises the newer:

ShowLimitedRaceMenu()

http://www.creationkit.com/ShowLimitedRaceMenu_-_Game

as opposed to:

ShowRaceMenu()

http://www.creationkit.com/ShowRaceMenu_-_Game


------------------------------------------------------
4: Installation / Uninstallation

Install:

Dump the files from the mod into your Skyrim/Data folder.


Uninstall:

Remove the files that came with the mod.
An easy way to do this would be to copy, (not cut),
the files into the folder a second time, and overwrite everything.
Now hit undo.
Assuming you\'re using windows this will delete the necessary files.


------------------------------------------------------
5: Version History / Bug Fixes

.8

___________

.81

1. Reduced lighting and changed the cell architecture. Shadow striping seems to be gone.

2. Changed an xmarker to an xmarkerheading. Added a cocheading.

3. Added some generic \"Hmmph.\" .Fuz files for those without silent dialogue mods.

4. Removed the belted tunic from his vendor chest inventory.

___________

.82

1. Updated for 1.9

2. Reduced size of his robe textures.

3. Updated file header and readme.

4. Repackaged to utilise .BSAs and is now NMM compatible.

5. Fixed issue where Hargnar was not actually charging the 50 gold for the haircut.


------------------------------------------------------
6: Incompatibilities / Known Issues

I can think of nothing that would conflict with this.

------------------------------------------------------
7: Legal


Do not upload this to any site other than the Nexus. (Without consulting me first.)
Otherwise, I don\'t care what is done with any of the parts of this, 
but you must follow the rules set by Bethesda and/or The Nexus.
author: MojoDaJojo

files.name: ShowRaceMenuOptions_Dot_Eight_One
files.changelogHtml:
1. Reduced lighting and changed the cell architecture. Shadow striping seems to be gone.
2. Changed an xmarker to an xmarkerheading. Added a cocheading.
3. Added some generic \"Hmmph.\" .Fuz files for those without silent dialogue mods.
4. Removed the belted tunic from his vendor chest inventory.
